About Me

A well-rounded ML Engineer. My experience covers both research and development. As a developer, I am focused on building products for real-world ML applications. The research side is closely associated with DL and NLP. My aim is to make significant contributions to the machine learning community. I am most skilled in:

MLOps NLP Python PyTorch
